LDAP Controls 0.2

Uses of Class
com.sun.jndi.ldap.BasicControl

Uses of BasicControl in com.sun.jndi.ldap
 

Subclasses of BasicControl in com.sun.jndi.ldap
 class EntryChangeResponseControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for entry-change notification as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-psearch-02.txt.
 class ManageReferralControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for manageDsaIT as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-namedref-00.txt.
 class PersistentSearchControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for the persistent search mechanism as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-psearch-02.txt.
 

Uses of BasicControl in com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl
 

Subclasses of BasicControl in com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl
 class DirSyncControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for directory synchronization as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-dirsync-01.txt.
 class DirSyncResponseControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for directory synchronization as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-dirsync-01.txt.
 class PagedResultsControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Control for paged-results as defined in RFC-2696.
 class PagedResultsResponseControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for paged-results as defined in RFC-2696.
 class SortControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for server-side sorting of search results as defined in RFC-2891.
 class SortResponseControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for server-side sorting of search results as defined in RFC-2891.
 class TreeDeleteControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for Tree Delete as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-treedelete-02.txt The control has no control value.
 class VirtualListViewControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for virtual-list-view as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-ldapv3-vlv-04.txt.
 class VirtualListViewResponseControl
          This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for virtual-list-view as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-ldapv3-vlv-04.txt.
